<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>決裁書記号に値が入力された場合、年度に自動で値を入力する</description><global>false</global><name>x_562723_snmogi.autoNendoAssets</name><script><![CDATA[var x_562723_snmogi = x_562723_snmogi || {};

x_562723_snmogi.autoNendoAssets = (function() {
	"use strict";

	var curKigou = g_form.getValue('u_kigou');
	if(curKigou != null) {
		current.u_nendo = current.u_kigou.u_riyounendo;
	}

	return {

/* set your public API here. For example:
		incrementAndReturnPrivateVar: function() {
			return private_function();
		},
*/
		type:  "autoNendoAssets"
	};
})();
]]></script><script_name>autoNendoAssets</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-07 06:01:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>0d6d37b72fd23010cd78bcb62799b6f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_562723_snmogi.autoNendoAssets</sys_name><sys_package display_value="決裁システム" source="x_562723_snmogi">807077ab2f013010056f28a62799b687</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="決裁システム">807077ab2f013010056f28a62799b687</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_0d6d37b72fd23010cd78bcb62799b6f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-07 06:01:55</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>true</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
